chart.title: Annual change in forest area
chart.subtitle: Net change in forest area measures forest expansion (either through afforestation or natural expansion) minus deforestation
chart.note: The UN FAO publish forest data as the annual average on 10- or 5-year timescales.
chart.citation: UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO). Forest Resources Assessment.

Annual net change in forest area.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Annual net change in forest area.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Annual change in forest area” [dataset]. UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO). Forest Resources Assessment. [original data].
